synos.tran: 反动的；反动主义的；反对改革的

remMethod.val: 来自reaction (反动) + ary → 反动的

words.tran: 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用
极端保守主义；反动思想

trans.tranCn: 保守的，反动的；反动主义的；反对改革的
trans.tranOther: very strongly opposed to any social or political change - used to show disapproval

trans.tranCn: 反动分子；反动派；保守派
trans.tranOther: someone who strongly opposes any social or political change - used to show disapproval
